de.tum.ws2010.propra.raytracer.scenes
Class ChristmasScene

java.lang.Object
  de.tum.ws2010.propra.raytracer.render.Scene
      de.tum.ws2010.propra.raytracer.scenes.ChristmasScene

public class ChristmasScene
extends Scene

A nice Christmas scene. Funny what you can do by only using spheres, boxes, cylinders and cones.

Author:
(c) 2010-11 Roland Fraedrich (fraedrich@tum.de)
